text: @CervicalCancerAwareness#CervicalCancerPrevention #HPVVaccine #PapTestDid you know that cervical cancer is a preventable disease? 🎯👀According to Wright, vaccination is key! 💉 Get your HPV test today, which tests for the virus that causes cervical cancer. 🔬Don't miss out on free breast and cervical cancer screening resources in Massachusetts! 🎁Follow the American College of Obstetricians and Gynecologists recommendations:📆 Ages 21-29: Pap test every 3 years. 📝If diagnosed, follow up with an oncologist immediately! 🏥Let's work together to eradicate cervical cancer within our lifetime! 💪🏼
